channel.title: pyimagesearch on Matias Pan's blog
channel.description: Recent content in pyimagesearch on Matias Pan's blog

item.title: Tracking color objects with GoCV
item.description: Disclaimer: this blog post is just a port of Adrian’s tutorial at pyimagesearch where he shows how to track a ball using Python and OpenCV. I only changed a few things here and there and rewrote it using Go and GoCV. So all the credit should go to him I always prefer to start by showing what you’ll get if you stick to the end, so here it goes: Hooked? Awesome.
